 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָבָא‎</span>] **verb** ==wage war, serve== (Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֿבא‎</span> ***wage war with***, also noun ***army, campaign*** [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chrest. 125</sup> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv. 299, 1. 2</sup> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>VOJ i.28</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ( &gt; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***wage war***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒâbu, man, soldier;***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xl (1886), 726</sup> and others compare (on account of Sabean, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***conceal oneself***, hence ***lie in wait***; this is phonetically suitable, but better in meaning would be <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***go*** or ***come forth*** (against one), etc., so [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 21</sup>; [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>232</sup> compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***young man***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צבְאוּ‎</span> [[Exod.38.8|Exod 38:8]]; [[Zech.14.12|Zech 14:12]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְבְּאוּ‎</span> [[Num.31.7|Num 31:7]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִצְבֹּא‎</span> [[Isa.31.4|Isa 31:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִצְבאֹ‎</span> [[Num.4.23|Num 4:23]]; [[Num.8.24|Num 8:24]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹבְאִים‎</span> [[Num.31.42|Num 31:42]]; [[Isa.29.7|Isa 29:7]]; [[Isa.29.8|Isa 29:8]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹבֶיהָ‎</span> [[Isa.29.7|Isa 29:7]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75oo»§ 75oo</sup>; [[BDB#Di|Di]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרֶיהָ‎</span>); feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹבְאֹת‎</span> [[Exod.38.8|Exod 38:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֹבְאוֺת‎</span> [[1Sam.2.22|1Sam 2:22]] — 

**1.** ***wage war, fight***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> ***against***, [[Num.31.7|Num 31:7]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Isa.29.7|Isa 29:7]]; [[Isa.29.8|Isa 29:8]]; [[Isa.31.4|Isa 31:4]]; [[Zech.14.12|Zech 14:12]], with suffix [[Isa.29.7|Isa 29:7]] (?); absolute [[Num.31.42|Num 31:42]]([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**2.** ***serve*** at sacred tent, Levites, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָבָא‎</span> [[Num.4.23|Num 4:23]]; [[Num.8.24|Num 8:24]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); women [[Exod.38.8|Exod 38:8]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[1Sam.2.22|1Sam 2:22]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמַּצְבִּא אֶתעַֿם וגו‎</span> [[2Kgs.25.19|2Kgs 25:19]] = [[Jer.52.25|Jer 52:25]] ***muster.***.
